attributes.action: Tell Parliament to debate important issues in a reasonable, adult manner.
attributes.background: I represent the silent moderate majority. We accuse half the world of extremism - when we are extreme ourselves. Parliament is degrading into an episode of Big Brother. Get a grip. Parliament is SERIOUS business,  not a playground or a celebrity show.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like Parliament to do. For example, you could ask for a specific change to the rules of parliamentary debate.
